title: Encountering a Snake - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Adopted Children   Beastkin   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cunning Protagonist   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Demons   Disabilities   Discrimination   Heartwarming   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Lovers Reunited   Mute Character   Obsessive Love   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Reincarnation   R*pe   S*xual Abuse   Strong Love Interests   Unrequited Love   Yandere
author: 溯痕
description:
Getting drenched by a hot cup of tea is like emptying a basin of dog’s blood over your head.

The snake demon could not remain calm, and discovered after biting back that, it actually did not matter if he bit him or not.

This person—was going to die anyways.

A touching story between a mortal and a snake demon that started because of a hot cup of tea. And their entanglement that lasted three lifetimes.>
